_doc._description: This section of the document is meant to help understand the organization of key-value pairs and how it supports the creation of files from  https://docs.cbioportal.org/5.1-data-loading/data-loading/file-formats as part of the cBioportal ETL

merged_x._description: Support information for merged genomic data and supporting meta files.
merged_x.dir: output directory for merged results. Should match output dir specified by etl conversion script at run time

dtypes._description: Data types - cBio defined data types. _comment has link to detailed specifics in each section.
dtypes.ext: File extension of merged outputs from etl script
dtypes.cbio_name: cBio output file name - a soft link to the etl output created inside the study directory
dtypes.meta_file_attributes: Direct key-value paris used by cBio in a meta_x file used to describe data_x files

sections.study: Special meta file used to describe the cBio study
sections.case_x: cBio case lists - sample lists describing which samples have mutation data, sv data, cnv data, etc. See https://docs.cbioportal.org/5.1-data-loading/data-loading/file-formats#case-lists for specifics
sections.data_sheets: Clinical patient and sample data as well as gene matrix if panel data present. Distinct from other data_x files in that in contains sample and patient metadata and not genomic data

database_pulls._description: This section is used to support pulling auto-generated clinical data tables and supporting genomics etl information from the D3b Data Warehouse

<manifest descriptor>._description: The key for this field is meant to be a convenient descriptor of what sub-study files derive from, as a cBio study make come from many sources
<manifest descriptor>.table: D3b warehouse table name with relevant file info
<manifest descriptor>.file_types: Manifests typically contain all possible harmonization outputs. Specifying specific file_type(s) limits to relevant outputs. Exception is annotated_public_output, etl will pull only he maf as vcfs are included in that query.

database_pulls.x_head: Special header tsv file for data_clinical(sample/patient). cBio data_clinical headers have 5 header rows, and which columns are used are determined by the x_file table. Should be just the file name
database_pulls.x_file: sample or patient tables with corresponding metadata at the sample and patient levels
database_pulls.genomics_etl: a helper file with relevant cBio sample names and individual genomic files names for ETL merging
database_pulls.seq_center: only if project has RNA data, a helper file to fill in missing sequencing center information for genomics etl
database_pulls.gene_file: Only if study has panel data, the source information for gene matrix in the data_sheets section

meta_file_attr.profile_description: PNOC consensus calls from strelka2, mutect2, lancet, and VarDict Java. Two or more callers required to pass, < 0.001 frequency in gnomAD, and min read depth 8 in normal sample, unless in a TERT promoter region or in a hotspot region (see https://www.cancerhotspots.org)
Predicted copy number values from WGS (Continuous). Copy number calls obtained using ControlFreeC, filtering calls smaller than 50KB
Predicted copy number values from WGS (Discrete). Values: -2 = homozygous deletion; -1 = hemizygous deletion; 0 = neutral / no change; 1 = gain; 2 = high level amplification

meta_file_attr.description: Somatic CNA data (copy number ratio from tumor samples minus ratio from matched normals)

meta_file_attr.profile_description: Expression levels from RNA-Seq, Z scores of log2(FPKM + 1) values
PNOC fusion data using arriba and STAR Fusion, annotated and filtered using annoFuse.

study.description: Genomic characterization of Pacific Pediatric Neuro-Oncology Consortium Clinical Genomics Atlas samples provided by the Pacific Pediatric Neuro-Oncology Consortium (PNOC), and its partners via the Gabriella Miller Kids First Data Resource Center. PNOC has generated and provided WGS and WXS for subjects enrolled in a PNOC clinical trial. This data set is part of the OpenDIPG Initiative that has collected, generated, harmonized and annotated the largest cohort of DIPG genome data to date. For updates, please see here: Release Notes
study.display_name: Pacific Pediatric Neuro-Oncology Consortium Clinical Genomics Atlas (PNOC, PBTA, Provisional)

cases_3way_complete.case_list_name: Tumor samples with mutation, CNA and mRNA data
cases_3way_complete.case_list_description: All tumor samples with mutation, CNA, and mRNA data

cases_cnaseq.case_list_name: Tumor samples with mutation and CNA data
cases_cnaseq.case_list_description: All tumor samples with mutation and CNA data

cases_RNA_Seq_v2_mRNA.case_list_name: Tumor Samples with mRNA data (RNA Seq V2)
cases_RNA_Seq_v2_mRNA.case_list_description: All samples with mRNA expression data

cases_sequenced.case_list_description: All tumor samples with mutation data

cases_sv.case_list_description: All tumor samples with fusion data

database_pulls._comment: This section is used to numerate relevant database schema and tables needed for clinical data and supporting genomic etl files
